scripts.transform: find . -type f | grep -v "node_modules" | grep .es6.js$ | while read -r line; do babel --modules common --optional selfContained $line --out-file ${line/.es6/""} --source-maps-inline; done;
scripts.watch:transform: nodemon -e es6.js --ignore node_modules/ -x npm run transform
scripts.hint: find . -type f | grep -v "node_modules" | grep .es6.js$ | while read -r line; do jshint $line; done;
